EmailTemplate.name: CR 5.2.1 Job Offer Post Assessment
EmailTemplate.subject: Your assessment for the NCS programme
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Please do not respond to this email. The email was sent from an unattended mailbox and responses are not reviewed. Please instead contact your staffing representative on {!Contact.Contact_Owner_alternative_email__c}.
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Congratulations! Following your assessment we would like to provisionally offer you a role with us this autumn as a {!Job_Application__c.Role_to_assess_for__c}.
This offer is dependent on you meeting all of the following criteria:
DBS certificate
All staff must produce an ‘Enhanced DBS certificate with Barred List check’ dated after 31 January 2014. You can either upload an existing DBS certificate* or apply for a new DBS certificate through GB Group through the Staffing Website.
Instructions and directions for the DBS application website can be found on the Staffing Website. Please read these instructions carefully before starting your application. Please use the ‘Organisation Pin’ and ‘Secret Word’ below to start your GB Group application.
Organisation Pin: 139135
Secret Word: TCNCS15
*To check if your existing Enhanced DBS fits The Challenge’s requirements, please refer to FAQ 6.3.
References
You will need to to provide contact details for two referees. We will contact these referees to confirm your suitability to work with young people. Please make sure your referees are willing to be contacted by us before submitting their information.
Essential Information
Each section of the Essential Information page should be completed at least one week before your start date. This includes bank and tax details, health and safety information, emergency contact details and inclusion information.
On inclusion, If you haven't already done so, please let us know if you require any adjustment or assistance in the workplace. The information you provide will enable us to support you appropriately. Due to the nature of our programmes, it is important that you advise us of any adjustment or assistance that you require as soon as possible so that we have time to put any adjustments in place.
All of the above information may be shared with relevant partner organisations (e.g. outdoors activity venues, catering companies) where necessary.
Availability
Your offer of employment is conditional upon the current availability of your role. Please note not all roles are available in all geographical locations. You will be able to submit your preferred work dates in the ‘Choosing when I can work’ section. If there are any dates you can’t work throughout the summer, please include them in the ‘Dates when I can’t work’ section. Based on this information, the Staffing Team will try to match you to vacant roles that fit with your availability.
Training
Training is an important and compulsory part of all our seasonal roles and we cannot allow you to work on the NCS programme without it. If you have not already attended training this year you will be able to book yourself onto the relevant training session on the ‘Booking Training’ page.
We will call you in the upcoming weeks to discuss work dates and talk through any questions you may have.
In the meantime, if you have any urgent questions please contact me quoting the email reference number below in any correspondence. Further information can also be found on our FAQs.
Congratulations again, and see you on the programme!
Best wishes,
The Challenge NCS Programme {!Contact.OwnerFullName} {!Contact.Contact_Owner_alternative_email__c}
Email Reference: CR 5.2.1
